files.patch:
@@ -1300,0 +1300,8 @@ + * All valid {@linkplain Charset Charsets} decode strings using chunks of a fixed + * octet length N. For example: + *
    + *
  • N=1 for {@link StandardCharsets#UTF_8} (A B C D 0)
    • + *
  • N=2 for {@link StandardCharsets#UTF_16} (AA BB CC DD 00)
    • + *
  • N=4 for {@link StandardCharsets#UTF_16} (AAAA BBBB CCCC DDDD 0000)
    • + *
+ *
